overview:
Ms. Tracey M.Chaffin joined Pamlico Capital in 1995. She serves as the Chief Financial Officer of Pamlico Capital and is responsible for the firmâ€™s portfolio administration and finance activities. Ms. Chaffin is a Certified Public Accountant.

Prior to joining Pamlico Capital, Ms. Chaffin was Financial Accounting Manager in the Corporate and Investment Banking Group at First Union Corporation and was a Senior Accountant at Price Waterhouse LLP. Ms. Chaffin received a BS and an MAcc from The University of Florida.
